Rulings.Edison: ●If the Level of Fortune Lady Earth is reduced by an effect like Miniaturize, the effect to inflict damage won't activate when Fortune Lady Earth's Level returns to normal.

Rulings.Base: 1. If the Level of "Fortune Lady Earth" is reduced by an effect like "Miniaturize", the effect to inflict damage will not activate when the Level of "Fortune Lady Earth" returns to normal.
